Sanjana Banerjee (সঞ্জনা ব্যানার্জী) is a Bengali actress and model. She Debuted in Bengali movie opposite Yash Dasgupta in Fidaa, Directed by Pathikrit Basu and the movie was released in Eid 2018.

Biography & Wiki

Sanjana Banerjee’s nickname is Sanjana. She was born on 12 August 1997 in Muscat, Oman. Hence, her current age is 22 years. Sanjana’s Zodiac is Leo. She comes in Kolkata to meet her grandparents. Now she moved in into Kolkata. Sanjana Banerjee is campaigning for some brand and svf sported her and call for Audition. Before debuting in the movie, she did many Commercial ads in Kolkata.

Money Factor

Sanjana Banerjee is earned ₹20000 Lakh for her debut movie Fidaa. Her total net worth is ₹1.2 crore.

Contact Address

Filmography

Sanjana Banerjee started her career with Modeling and Tv commercials. After watching her in the commercial the SVF ( Shree Venkatesh Films ) called her for an audition. The after auditioning her several times and attending a few workshops she was finally cast in the movie titled “Fidaa” opposite Yash Dasgupta. The movie was released in July 2018 on the occasion of Eid which was directed by Pathikrit Basu.

Recently Sanjana did a music video with Jhon Bhattacharya composed by Anupam Roy “Durga Puja” album under SVF Music titled “Mithye Kotha”.

Facts about Sanjana Banerjee

  • Sanjana Banerjee is not so comfortable with the Bengali, so her co-star Yash Dasgupta helps her to learn Bengali.
  • There were false rumors of the relationship between Sanjana and Ankush Hazra.
  • Sanjana loves “City of Joy” Kolkata.
